snippet: A federal judge refused to block the governor’s removal of two-thirds of the members of a school board in suburban Atlanta.
abstract: Federal Judge Richard W Story refuses to block Georgia Gov Nathan Deal's removal of two-thirds of members of school board in suburban Atlanta.
lead_paragraph: A federal judge refused to block the governor’s removal of two-thirds of the members of a school board in suburban Atlanta.

headline.seo: Georgia: Judge Upholds Gutting of Local School Board
headline.main: Georgia: Judge Upholds Gutting of Local School Board
headline.print_headline: Georgia: Judge Upholds Gutting of Local School Board
